plot: Lupe (Velez) is in love with the sailor Juancho (De Cordova) but is also courted by Ramón (Falcon) and old Don Atanasio (Icardo). Juancho leaves town but promises to return. Time goes by ...
title: La zandunga
plot_es: Lupe (Velez) is in love with the sailor Juancho (De Cordova) but is also courted by Ramón (Falcon) and old Don Atanasio (Icardo). Juancho leaves town but promises to return. Time goes by ...
